channel.title: THOUGHT on IC Steve
channel.description: Recent content in THOUGHT on IC Steve

item.title: 3 Good Practices of Hardward CAD Framework
item.description: In IC (Integrated Circuit) industry, CAD is a function to make hardware designer’s life easy. This is how I define CAD in hardware design. “Easy” contains different meanings. Easy to understand the inputs Easy to use the functions Easy to check the result (Accurate and reliable) A lot of people always like to use Apple products as an example. Here I am. Apple has suitable technologies but not the most advanced technology.
